summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tank and Sump Hygiene Services Platform MVP. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend authentication, dashboard, and most features working correctly. Critical issue found in booking wizard due to Razorpay integration error.

ui_bugs.issue: Razorpay integration causing component crash - 'object is not iterable' error
ui_bugs.details: useRazorpay hook import/usage causing BookService component to fail completely, preventing booking wizard from loading

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete booking flow due to BookService component crash
integration_issues.details: Booking wizard fails to load first step due to Razorpay integration error

passed_tests: Landing page loads with eco-friendly branding
Navigation from landing page to auth page
User login with email and password
Dashboard displays correctly with user name
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Razorpay integration in BookService component. The useRazorpay hook is causing 'object is not iterable' error, preventing the entire booking wizard from loading. This blocks the core booking functionality. Consider either fixing the Razorpay import/usage or implementing a temporary workaround for COD payments.
